text:
They are running supported version of OS i.e., Windows 10 21H2 and also they are
active, most of them are checking in to Intune daily. Since the number of non
compliant devices are high and Intune is patching them, can't able to know exact
status of each device except there patch level.

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement]
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from sarathkumargc@gmail.com. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
They are running supported version of OS i.e., Windows 10 21H2 and also they are
active, most of them are checking in to Intune daily. Since the number of non
compliant devices are high and Intune is patching them, can't able to know exact
status of each device except there patch level. 
On Wed, Nov 29, 2023 at 1:09 AM 'Charles F Sullivan' via PatchManagement
<patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/CAPy_2FdCSWXaevaSyPvosffMikazEF-TUBqwUgOtUC_AHbZLXg%40mail.gmail.com
